location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General, Public Department, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The letter and its enclosed information have been subject to insect damage including the date of the letter and office of the correspondent on the recto of folio 10, the last word of each line on the verso of folio 10 and numerous words on the left hand side of the text on the recto of folio 11.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing extracts from the audit of the Bushire Residency accounts with remarks and orders of government relating to individual entries.
